nodes.text: Rennik was a spacer who owned the freighter Worldhopper. He was a widower who had twin sons.

During the time of the New Republic, he was hired by Whistler and Gate, Corran Horn and Wedge Antilles' astromech droids. He was to take them from Imperial space to the city of Oradin on the planet Brentaal IV. There the droids met with smuggler Talon Karrde.
